data.title: Filmography
data.text:
"Beyond the Sierras" (MGM, 1928) Directed by: Nick Grinde. Cast: Tim McCoy, Sylvia Beecher, Roy D'Arcy, Polly Moran, Richard R. Neill, J. Gordon Russell.

"Alias French Gertie" (RKO Radio, 1930) Directed by: George Archainbaud. Cast: Bebe Daniels, Ben Lyon, Robert Emmett O'Connor, John Ince, Daisy Belmore, Betty Pierce, Maude Turner Gordon, Nella Walker, Charles Giblyn, Nora Cecil.

"Alias: The Bad Man" (Tiffany Productions, 1931) Directed by: Phil Rosen. Cast: Ken Maynard, Virginia Brown Faire, Frank Mayo, Charles King, Robert Homans, Irving Bacon, Lafe M. McKee, Ethan Allen, Tarzan, Tom Bay, Hank Bell.

"Arizona Terror" (Tiffany Productions, 1931) Directed by: Phil Rosen. Cast: Ken Maynard, Lina Basquette, Hooper Atchley, Nina Quartero, Michael Visaroff, Murdock MacQuarrie, Charles King, Tom London, Tarzan, Ralph Bucko, Roy Bucko.

"Branded" (Columbia, 1931) Directed by: D. Ross Lederman. Cast: Buck Jones, Ethel Kenyon, Wallace McDonald, Philo McCullough, Albert J. Smith, John Oscar, Clark Burroughs, Fred Burns, Tom Bay, Milton Brown.

"Dracula" (Universal, 1931) Directed by: Tod Browning. Cast: Bela Lugosi, Helen Chandler, David Manners, Dwight Frye, Edward Van Sloan, Herbert Bunston, Frances Dade, Joan Standing, Charles K. Gerrard, Anna Bakacs.

"The Hard Hombre" (Allied, 1931) Directed by: Otto Brower. Cast: Hoot Gibson, Lina Basquette, Matilde Comont, G. Raymond Nye, Jessie Arnold, Jack Byron, Christian Frank, Rosa Gore, Bill Robbins, Frank Winkleman.

"The Texas Ranger" (Columbia, 1931) Directed by: D. Ross Lederman. Cast: Buck Jones, Carmelita Geraghty, Harry Woods, Ed Brady, Nelson McDowell, Harry Todd, Billy Bletcher, Budd Fine, Bert Woodruff, Silver, Roy Bucko.

"Law and Order" (Universal, 1932) Directed by: Edward L. Cahn. Cast: Walter Huston, Harry Carey, Russell Hopton, Raymond Hatton, Ralph Ince, Harry Woods, Richard Alexander, Russell Simpson, Andy Devine, Victor Adamson.

"Texas Gun Fighter" (Tiffany Productions, 1932) Directed by: Phil Rosen. Cast: Ken Maynard, Tarzan, Sheila Mannors, Lloyd Ingraham, Jim Mason, Harry Woods, Ralph Bucko, Roy Bucko, Bob Burns, Bob Card, Frank Clark.

"Whistlin' Dan" (Tiffany Productions, 1932) Directed by: Phil Rosen. Cast: Ken Maynard, Tarzan, Joyzelle, Georges Renavent, Harlan E. Knight, Don Terry, Jessie Arnold, Hank Bell, Charles Brinley, Ralph Bucko, Roy Bucko.

"The Tonto Kid" (Resolute, 1934) Directed by: Harry L. Fraser. Cast: Rex Bell, Ruth Mix, Buzz Barton, Theodore Lorch, Joseph Gerard, Barbara Roberts, Jack Rockwell, Murdock McQuarrie, Bert Lindley, Jane Keckley.

"The Arizonian" (RKO Radio, 1935) Directed by: Charles Vidor. Cast: Richard Dix, Margot Grahame, Preston Foster, Louis Calhern, James Bush, J. Farrell MacDonald, Ray Mayer, Willie Best, Joseph Sauers, Francis Ford.

"Lawless Range" (Republic, 1935) Directed by: Robert N. Bradbury. Cast: John Wayne, Sheila Mannors, Frank McGlynn Jr., Jack Curtis, Wally Howe, Julia Griffith, Yakima Canutt, Earl Dwire, Victor Adamson, Chuck Baldra.

"Outlawed Guns" (Universal, 1935) Directed by: Ray Taylor. Cast: Buck Jones, Ruth Channing, Frank McGlynn Sr., Roy D'Arcy, Pat J. O'Brien, Jos. W. Girard, Joan Gale, Lee Shumway, Chas. King, Jack Rockwell.

"Custer's Last Stand" (Stage & Screen Productions Inc., 1936) 15-chapter serial Directed by: Elmer Clifton. Cast: Rex Lease, Lona Andre, William Farnum, Ruth Mix, Jack Mulhall, Nancy Caswell, George Cheseboro, Dorothy Gulliver, Frank McGlynn Jr., Helen Gibson, Josef Swickard, Chief Thundercloud, Reed Howes, Bobbie Nelson, Robert Walker, Marty Joyce, Milburn Moranti, George Morrell, Creighton Hale, Ted Adams.

Cast: Frankie Thomas, Frances Robinson, Jack Mulhall, Al Shean, Norman Willis, Anthony Warde, Earl Douglas, William Benedict, Frank Mayo, Alan Gregg, Stanley Blystone, Everette Brown, Skippy, Ernie Adams, Ed Brady, Al Bridge, Lane Chandler, William Desmond, Kenneth Harlan, Ethan Laidlaw.

Farrell MacDonald, William Gould, Rex Lease, Henry Otho, John Beach, Glenn Strange, Stanley Blystone, Edwin Parker, Al Taylor, Carleton Young, Ernie Adams, Griff Barnett, Billy Bletcher, Forrest Burns.
